data.feedback: Excellent planning with complete requirement coverage. All 4 epics fully cover user's requested features. Files verified through actual codebase reads - all filesToModify exist, all filesToRead exist, backend APIs for sharing/goals/user-search confirmed. Pattern compliance is perfect - matches existing Clean Architecture, BLoC, GetIt DI patterns. Dependencies and execution order are logical.
suggestions: Firebase config files (google-services.json, GoogleService-Info.plist) need to be downloaded from Firebase Console - not generated
Consider adding a settings feature epic for managing health permissions UI (currently planned in native-integration but could be its own feature)
